name: Carnage Lair
description:
Carnage Lair is an arcade platform shooter delivering an infinite amount of generated levels while giving the player the experience of brutal mayhem. This game caters to the casual audience with a very basic play style, but also has competitive multiplayer and the "50 stages" game mode designed for speedrunners.

Visit the Carnage Lair speedrun leaderboards! 

https://www.speedrun.com/Carnage_Lair

Controls: Mouse and WASD
